heading: passage: allen funt, 84
subheading: allen funt, the master of the hidden camera who taught americans not to take themselves too seriously, died sunday of complications from a stroke. the creator and host of the tv classic candid camera, funt captured human reactions to baffling situations, then surprised his subjects with his famous punch line, "smile, you're on candid camera." after his retirement in the late 1970s, funt ran a cattle ranch in california.
author: wired staff
text: allen funt, the master of the hidden camera who taught americans not to take themselves too seriously, died sunday of complications from a stroke. the creator and host of the tv classic  candid camera, funt captured human reactions to baffling situations, then surprised his subjects with his famous punch line, "smile, you're on candid camera." after his retirement in the late 1970s, funt ran a cattle ranch in california.
